channel.title: Hole in the face
channel.description:
Hello. My server, lollyscape is a older server on these forums. And older servers tend to have a gap in the lower jaw where the beard should be on your character. Anyone got a solution so the beard acutally appears, and there isn't just a gap? I'll post a creenie in a minute.
Thanks ollie123

item.title: Hole in the face
item.dc:creator: @Inmate1 Inmate™
item.description:
@Inmate1 wrote:

I know its quite annoyin, I know to fix helmets and torso’s
